column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I go through my kitchen and look for items I don ' t have or are very low on : food , sponges , spices , napkins , etc. .
#id=2
#text=I also quickly check my bathroom to see if I need anything in there : toilet paper , soap , deodorant , etc. .
#id=3
#text=I do this because I can buy both sets of items at the grocery store in the same trip .
#id=4
#text=I make a list of these things on a piece of paper or type them in my phone , so I can easily recall any of the items I need without forgetting anything .
#id=5
#text=I drive to the store after I prepare my bags in the trunk .
#id=6
#text=Once at the store , I grab a cart , set my bags in the cart , and place my phone in the space allocated for the child seat .
#id=7

#text=Now I ' m ready to start my grocery shopping : I mechanically go down every aisle and pick up any items I need from those aisles , all the while keeping an eye on my list to make sure I don ' t forget anything .
#id=8
#text=Once I have all my items , I pay for the groceries and help bag them up .
#id=9
#text=I drive home with my freshly bought groceries , and go about putting them away in their respective places once home .
#text=With the last item set in its place , the grocery shopping is complete .
